document.heading: GOVERNMENT REPORTS ELECTRONIC PUBLICATION REQUIREMENT AMENDMENT ACT OF 2002

history.narrative: Law 14-195, the “Government Reports Electronic Publication Requirement Amendment Act of 2002”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 14-28, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 18, 2002, and July 2, 2002, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 17, 2002, it was assigned Act No. 14-428 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 14-195 became effective on October 17, 2002.
